snippet: Julian Fellowes, the series creator, will continue to write every episode of the drama, whose fifth season begins Jan. 4 and sixth will begin in 2016.
abstract: PBS says it has secured deal for sixth season of television series Downton Abbey.
lead_paragraph: Julian Fellowes, the series creator, will continue to write every episode of the drama, whose fifth season begins Jan. 4 and sixth will begin in 2016.

headline.main: PBS to Broadcast a Sixth Season of ‘Downton Abbey’
